[b]Time Trainer Metronome v1.1
Requirements: Android 2.1 and up
Overview: The Time Trainer app is a LOT MORE than a metronome. [/b]
================================================================================================

[img]http://s25.postimg.org/ql6r7herz/unnamed3.jpg[/img]

[img]http://s25.postimg.org/4aiw7ihhr/Time_Trainer_Metronome_Android_Apps_on_Google_Play_2014_06_13_11_59_28.png[/img]


[b] Description[/b]

 
The Time Trainer app is a LOT MORE than a metronome. Yes it has all the features you need in a metronome: accent control, tempo, a flasher and a few different sounds, but it also contains 3 exciting tools to help you develop your time away from the metronome: Bar Breaks, Random Beat Drop and Speed Upper.

Practicing with a metronome is one of the most important exercises you can do but it is also essential that you develop your own internal time feel, which is what this App is designed for!

This app was designed by me, for me - and you :) And I'm sure you find it as useful as I do!!

What's New

[i]Version 1.1[i]
Application now uses Google Play Licensing service, which should allow installations on non-stock Android versions. It requires the com.android.vending.CHECK_LICENSE permission to request license data from Google Play.

[b]This app has NO advertisements[/b]

[b]Requires Android - 2.1 and up [/b]

[b]Installation Notes :-[/b]

*Unzip the downloaded torrent file

*Copy and paste the apk file into sd_card of your android mobile

* Install it in your mobile.

[img]http://s25.postimg.org/oj69t8gsv/Time_Trainer_Metronome_Android_Apps_on_Google_Play_2014_06_13_12_07_55.png[/img]


[b]For more info :https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.justinguitar.app.TimeTrainer&hl=en[/b]
